com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.api.node
Interface ComponentNode

All Superinterfaces:
Accessible, BasicNode, ImageSource, Inheritable, Linkable, Traversable<ComponentNode>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponent, DelegateComponentNode
public interface ComponentNode
extends BasicNode, Inheritable, Traversable<ComponentNode>

Represents a "component" node in the JCR, typically an unstructured node in the hierarchy of a CQ page.

Many methods return an Optional type where a null instance would otherwise be returned.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getComponentNode

Optional<ComponentNode> getComponentNode(String relativePath)
Get the component node for the resource at the given path relative to the current node.

Parameters:
relativePath - relative path to component
Returns:
Optional node for component

getComponentNodes

List<ComponentNode> getComponentNodes()
Get a list of child nodes for the current node.

Returns:
list of component nodes or empty list if none exist

getComponentNodes

List<ComponentNode> getComponentNodes(Predicate<ComponentNode> predicate)
Get a predicate-filtered list of child nodes for the current node.

Parameters:
predicate - predicate used to filter nodes
Returns:
list of component nodes that meet the predicate criteria or empty list if none exist

getComponentNodes

List<ComponentNode> getComponentNodes(String relativePath)
Get a list of child nodes for the resource at the given path relative to this node.

Parameters:
relativePath - relative path to parent of desired nodes
Returns:
list of component nodes below the specified relative path or empty list if none exist

getComponentNodes

List<ComponentNode> getComponentNodes(String relativePath,
                                      String resourceType)
Get a list of child nodes for the resource at the given path relative to this node, returning only the nodes that have the specified resource type.

Parameters:
relativePath - relative path to parent of desired nodes
resourceType - sling:resourceType of nodes to get from parent node
Returns:
list of component nodes matching the given resource type below the specified relative path or empty list if none exist

getComponentNodes

List<ComponentNode> getComponentNodes(String relativePath,
                                      Predicate<ComponentNode> predicate)
Get a list of child nodes for the resource at the given path relative to this node, returning only the nodes that meet the predicate criteria.

Parameters:
relativePath - relative path to parent of desired nodes
predicate - predicate used to filter nodes
Returns:
list of component nodes that meet the predicate criteria below the specified relative path or empty list if none exist

getDesignNode

Optional<BasicNode> getDesignNode()
Get the design node for the current component.

Returns:
Optional design node for the current style

getNodesInherited

List<BasicNode> getNodesInherited(String relativePath)
Get the children of a node relative to the current node. If node does not exist relative to current page, inherit from a parent page.

Parameters:
relativePath - path relative to current node
Returns:
list of nodes representing children of the addressed node or inherited from a parent page (or empty list if none exist)

getParent

Optional<ComponentNode> getParent()
Get the parent of this node.

Returns:
parent component node or absent optional if resource has no parent
